summary: This is an email forwarding a notice of appeal filed by Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team, indicating she is appealing Judge Nathan's denial of her motion to modify pretrial conditions. The email is from a law firm paralegal to counsel.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, who is appealing the denial of her motion to modify pretrial conditions.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: The judge who denied Maxwell's motion, prompting the appeal.

persons.name: Nicole Simmon
persons.context: Sent the email forwarding the notice of appeal on behalf of Laura A. Menninger.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell who requested the notice of appeal be sent.

persons.name: Ann Lun
persons.context: Copied on the email regarding the notice of appeal.

connections.description: Laura Menninger is acting as defense attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, filing an appeal on her behalf.
Nicole Simmon is sending the email at the request of Laura Menninger, indicating a professional working relationship.
Judge Nathan presided over Maxwell's case and denied her motion, leading to the appeal.

events.title: Filing of Notice of Appeal
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team files a notice of appeal regarding the denial of her motion to modify pretrial conditions.

events.title: Denial of Motion to Modify Pretrial Conditions
events.description: Judge Nathan denied Ghislaine Maxwell's motion to modify her pretrial conditions, which is the subject of the appeal.

locations: SDNY-Clerk (Southern District of New York Clerk's Office)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is appealing Judge Nathan's denial of her motion to modify pretrial conditions.
The notice of appeal was filed on September 3, 2020, in case number 20 Cr. 330 (MN).
Laura Menninger is acting as defense counsel for Maxwell in this appeal.
The document is legal correspondence from the law firm Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C.
The appeal was sent via overnight delivery to the SDNY Clerk for filing.
